Community-Development-Block-Grant

Source: vignettes/Community-Development-Block-Grant.Rmd
Community-Development-Block-Grant.Rmd

About

“The Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) Program has Disaster Recovery grants to rebuild the affected areas and provide crucial seed money to start the recovery process. These flexible grants help cities, counties, and States recover from Presidentially declared disasters, especially in low-income areas, subject to availability of supplemental appropriations. Since CDBG Disaster Recovery (CDBG-DR) assistance may fund a broad range of recovery activities, HUD can help communities and neighborhoods that otherwise might not recover due to limited resources (https://www.hud.gov/program_offices/comm_planning/cdbg-dr).”

The datasets which this function deals with are located at https://drgr.hud.gov/public/data_downloads.html?programName=DR%20CDBG The first two datasets are the same, but are organized in a different manner.

Querying the HUD Exchange website for data is a bit different than HUD User. These functions directly download the data into memory. Furthermore, these datasets do not need a key.

Example

CDBG-DR Financial Report by Appropriation

This is an example grabbing the first file, DR CDBG CDBG-DR Financial Report by Appropriation, and displaying the first 6 rows.

library(hudr)
head(hudcdbg(file = 1))
#>   Appropriation Abbreviation                Appropriation
#> 3                   2001 WTC      2001 World Trade Center
#> 4                   2001 WTC      2001 World Trade Center
#> 5                   2001 WTC      2001 World Trade Center
#> 7                   2003 05J 2003-2004 Multiple Disasters
#> 8                   2003 05J 2003-2004 Multiple Disasters
#> 9                   2003 05J 2003-2004 Multiple Disasters
#>                                      Grantee           Grant Grant.Status
#> 3 Empire State Development Corporation (NYS) B-01-DW-36-0001       Active
#> 4 Empire State Development Corporation (NYS) B-02-DW-36-0001       Active
#> 5 Empire State Development Corporation (NYS) B-02-DW-36-0002       Active
#> 7                                    Alabama B-05-DJ-01-0001        Close
#> 8                                 California B-05-DJ-06-0001        Close
#> 9                                    Florida B-05-DJ-12-0001        Close
#>   Grant.$.(Grant.Level) Grant.Obligated.$ Obligated.% Grant.Disbursed.$
#> 3             700000000         696976538   0.9956808         696619914
#> 4            2000000000        2000000000   1.0000000        1944052600
#> 5             783000000         765482322   0.9776275         699427942
#> 7              10965311          10965311   1.0000000          10965311
#> 8              10403120          10430252   1.0026080          10403120
#> 9              98930861          98613712   0.9967942          98930861
#>   Disbursed.% Remaining.Balance
#> 3   0.9951713           3380086
#> 4   0.9720263          55947400
#> 5   0.8932668          83572058
#> 7   1.0000000                 0
#> 8   1.0000000                 0
#> 9   1.0000000                 0

Data Fields

  1. Appropriation Abbreviation

  2. Appropriation

  3. Grantee

  4. Grant

  5. Grant Status

  6. Grant $ (Grant Level)

  7. Grant Obligated $

  8. Obligated %

  9. Grant Disbursed $

  10. Disbursed %

  11. Remaining Balance

CDBG CDBG-DR Financial Report by Grantee

This is an example grabbing the second file, DR CDBG CDBG-DR Financial Report by Grantee, and displaying the first 6 rows.

head(hudcdbg(file = 2))
#>    Grantee.State Appropriation Abbreviation
#> 4        Alabama                   2003 05J
#> 6        Alabama                   2005 KRW
#> 7        Alabama                   2005 KRW
#> 9        Alabama                   2011 DF3
#> 10       Alabama                   2011 DF3
#> 11       Alabama                   2011 DF3
#>                           Appropriation              Grantee           Grant
#> 4          2003-2004 Multiple Disasters              Alabama B-05-DJ-01-0001
#> 6  2005 Hurricanes Katrina, Rita, Wilma              Alabama B-06-DG-01-0001
#> 7  2005 Hurricanes Katrina, Rita, Wilma              Alabama B-06-DG-01-0002
#> 9               2011 Multiple Disasters              Alabama B-12-DT-01-0001
#> 10              2011 Multiple Disasters       Birmingham, AL B-12-MT-01-0001
#> 11              2011 Multiple Disasters Jefferson County, AL B-12-UT-01-0001
#>    Grant.Status Grant.$.(Grant.Level) Grant.Obligated.$ Obligated.%
#> 4         Close              10965311          10965311   1.0000000
#> 6         Close              74388000          74388000   1.0000000
#> 7         Close              21225574          21225574   1.0000000
#> 9        Active              24697966          24697966   1.0000000
#> 10       Active               6386326           6386325   0.9999999
#> 11       Active               7847084           7831319   0.9979910
#>    Grant.Disbursed.$ Disbursed.% Remaining.Balance
#> 4           10965311   1.0000000               0.0
#> 6           74388000   1.0000000               0.0
#> 7           21225574   1.0000000               0.0
#> 9           24522854   0.9929099          175111.7
#> 10           3689246   0.5776789         2697080.4
#> 11           6961146   0.8870997          885938.3

Grantee State

Appropriation

Grant Status

Grant Disbursed $

Disbursed %

Remaining Balance

CDBG-DR Financial Report Monthly Summary

This is an example grabbing the third file, DR CDBG CDBG-DR Financial Report Monthly Summary, and displaying the first 6 rows. The data provides grants that were given in the last month.

head(hudcdbg(file = 3))
#>   Grantee.State              Grantee           Grant Grant.$.(deprecated)
#> 1       Alabama              Alabama B-12-DT-01-0001             24697966
#> 2       Alabama              Alabama B-13-DS-01-0001             49157000
#> 3       Alabama       Birmingham, AL B-12-MT-01-0001              6386326
#> 4       Alabama       Birmingham, AL B-13-MS-01-0001             17497000
#> 5       Alabama Jefferson County, AL B-12-UT-01-0001              7847084
#> 6       Alabama Jefferson County, AL B-13-US-01-0001              9142000
#>   Activity.Budget.$  %.Budget Activity.Obligation.$ %.Obligated
#> 1          24697966 1.0000000              24697966   1.0000000
#> 2          49157000 1.0000000              49157000   1.0000000
#> 3           6386325 0.9999999               6386325   0.9999999
#> 4          17497000 1.0000000              17497000   1.0000000
#> 5           7831319 0.9979910               7831319   0.9979910
#> 6           9075271 0.9927008               9075271   0.9927008
#>   Activity.Drawn.$ Activity.Budget.Disbursed.% Remaining.Balance
#> 1         24522854                   0.9929099          175111.7
#> 2         48189636                   0.9803209          967364.3
#> 3          3689246                   0.5776789         2697080.4
#> 4         14879730                   0.8504161         2617269.7
#> 5          6961146                   0.9004054          885938.3
#> 6          7809069                   0.8604778         1332931.0

Data Fields

Grantee

Grant

Activity Budget $

% Budget

Activity Obligation $

% Obligated

Activity Drawn $

Activity Budget Disbursed %

Remaining Balance
